subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Colts will give most of their starters the day off, adhering to Coach Tony Dungy’s practice of keeping his best players out of harm’s way in the final preseason game.
snippet: The Colts will give most of their starters the day off, adhering to Coach Tony Dungy’s practice of keeping his best players out of harm’s way in the final preseason game.
